argSrc: School uniforms should not be worn in our schools.
argTrg: They do offer the benefit that the competition over brand-name clothes and the discrimination of the socially weak are prevented.

argSrc: School uniforms should not be worn in our schools.
argTrg: Nevertheless hardly anyone wishes to dress themselves or their children in a standard uniform.

argSrc: School uniforms should not be worn in our schools.
argTrg: Plus such uniforms also stand for ideological conformity and for the suppression of individual self-development.

argSrc: They do offer the benefit that the competition over brand-name clothes and the discrimination of the socially weak are prevented.
